install.description: Version: 1.0 WP slide show 1.0.0 WP slide show module. Display image slide show using ajax.

param.name: play
param.label: Start status
param.description: SET UP: Tu dong chay sau khi click hay khong

param.name: folder
param.label: Images Folder URL
param.description: URL to folder contain images in slide show

param.name: description
param.label: Description parameters
param.description:
Specific parameter for each image. Images can have or don't have caption and link to another page.

Syntax:
imagename:caption=Image caption&url=http://imagelink
Example:
sl-1.jpg:caption=This is description for header 1&url=http://www.yoururlhere.com
Each image per line.
